main event: A bright unidentified light was observed in the sky near Miami, Florida on multiple occasions in 1958.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright, green flare or light that was very high in the sky and moving northward.
The object was also observed making a semi-circular arc across the sky towards the southwest.
Air traffic control and radar operators were unable to detect or identify the object.
The sightings occurred on multiple dates, including April 26, 1958 and June 21, 1958.
There were multiple witness reports of the sighting, including from a TV station reporter and military personnel.
sighted object: bright unidentified light in the sky
witnesses: TV station reporter, military personnel, civilians
